price: (Muhammad) berkata, "Ya Tuhan-ku, berilah keputusan dengan adil 976. Dan Tuhan kami ialah Tuhan Yang Maha Pemurah lagi Yang dimohon pertolongan-Nya terhadap apa yang kamu katakan".
arabic: قَٰلَ رَبِّ ٱحۡكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَرَبُّنَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلۡمُسۡتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ
footnotes: 976.  Yaitu antara kami dan ahli Mekah.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi uḥ'kum bil-ḥaqi warabbunā al-raḥmānu al-mus'taʿānu ʿalā mā taṣifūna
translations: the One Whose help is sought
